questions.Question: In 1820, this U.S. naval commissioner was killed in a duel. Which naval officer had earned distinction in the War of 1812 when his ship, the Unites States, captured the HMS Macedonian?

In 1765, the British Parliament passed this legislation placing taxes on various printed papers in the British colonies. Which legislation proved to be very unpopular with the colonies in the Americas?
This man was the jeweler and goldsmith for the Russian imperial court under the rule of Alexander III. Which man is best known for his elaborate production of 50 Easter eggs for the Romanov court?
